item.title: 印尼考虑征收煤炭出口税以增加国库收入
item.description: 据当地媒体援引一位政府部长的话报道，世界最大的煤炭出口国印度尼西亚可能会对化石燃料征收出口税，以增加国家收入。【原文：Indonesia, the world’s biggest coal exporter, may impose an export levy on the fossil fuel in a bid to boost state revenues, according to local media reports that cited a government minister.】

item.title: GMO 重申 "一代难得 "的新兴市场债务呼声
item.description: GMO 继续对其千载难逢的新兴市场地方债务推荐充满信心，并表示美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府的贸易和经济政策使这一赌注更具吸引力。【原文：GMO continues to have confidence in its once-in-a-generation recommendation on emerging market local debt, saying the trade and economic policies of US President Donald Trump’s administration make the bet even more attractive.】

item.title: 中国钢厂引领建材产量大幅下降
item.description: 6 月份，中国在解决主要工业商品供过于求问题上取得了进一步进展，粗钢产量创下了 10 个月以来的最大降幅，领衔建筑材料产量降幅。【原文：China made further headway in June in its bid to tackle oversupply of key industrial commodities, with crude steel production leading declines in construction materials with its biggest drop in 10 months.】

item.title: 据说马来西亚 PNB 将考虑斥资 7.05 亿美元出售收费公路部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚国有资产管理公司正在考虑出售其收费公路部门 Projek Lintasan Kota Holdings Sdn.【原文：Malaysia’s state-owned asset manager is considering selling its toll road unit Projek Lintasan Kota Holdings Sdn. in a deal that could be worth 3 billion ringgit ($705 million), people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度股市主要参与者关注简街可能的卷土重来
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: Energy Aspects称中国将增加石油进口以填补储备
item.description: Energy Aspects 认为，中国推动原油储备将有助于抵消商业需求的疲软，并使进口保持 "强劲"。【原文：China’s push to stockpile crude will help offset softer commercial demand and keep imports “robust,” according to Energy Aspects.】

item.title: 出口抵消消费下滑，中国经济增长 5.2
item.description: 中国第二季度经济增长超出预期，但对美国以外市场的强劲出口掩盖了国内消费需求疲软导致的压力加深。【原文：China’s economic growth exceeded expectations in the second quarter, but strong exports to markets outside the US masked deepening pressure caused by weak consumer demand at home.】

item.title: 新西兰央行称人口老龄化可能会长期影响中性官方现金利率
item.description: 根据储备银行的研究，随着时间的推移，新西兰人口老龄化可能会给官方现金利率的中性水平带来下行压力。【原文：New Zealand’s aging population is likely to put downward pressure on the neutral level of the Official Cash Rate over time, according to Reserve Bank research.】

item.title: 日本执政党面临失去上议院多数席位的风险
item.description: 日本执政党自民党及其联盟小伙伴公明党在本周日的选举中面临失去上议院多数席位的风险，这有可能进一步削弱首相石破茂及其少数派政府在与美国正在进行的贸易谈判中的地位。【原文：Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party and its junior coalition partner Komeito are at risk of losing its majority in the upper house in elections this Sunday, potentially weakening Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba and his minority government’s standing further amid ongoing trade negotiations with the US.】

item.title: 英伟达将恢复向中国销售 H20 芯片，出人意料地逆转美国市场
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）计划恢复向中国销售其H20人工智能加速器，因为华盛顿方面保证将批准此类运输，这与特朗普政府此前的立场大相径庭。【原文：Nvidia Corp. plans to resume sales of its H20 artificial intelligence accelerator to China based on assurances from Washington that such shipments would be approved, a dramatic reversal from the Trump administration’s earlier stance.】

item.title: 报道称泰国将任命维泰为央行行长
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，泰国准备任命资深银行家维泰-拉塔纳功（Vitai Ratanakorn）为下一任央行行长，内阁会议可能会批准这一任命。【原文：Thailand is poised to name veteran banker Vitai Ratanakorn as the next governor of the central bank, local media reported ahead of a cabinet meeting likely to endorse the appointment.】

item.title: 日本防卫厅对中国试探活动表示担忧
item.description: 东京在其年度防卫白皮书中对中国船只和飞机在日本和台湾周边的探测活动发出了新的警告，并强调了对此类活动的担忧。【原文：Tokyo highlighted its concern over probing activity by Chinese ships and aircraft around Japan and Taiwan with new warnings about such activity in its annual defense white paper.】

item.title: 刺激政策呼声高涨，中国房价加速下跌
item.description: 6 月份，中国房价下跌速度加快，这凸显了人们对采取更多措施振兴房地产市场的猜测与日俱增。【原文：China’s home prices fell at a faster pace in June, underscoring growing speculation for additional measures to revive the property market.】

item.title: 韩国 LG 发布人工智能模型，加速全球竞争
item.description: LG 集团正在推出新版旗舰人工智能模型，并称其为韩国首个混合推理人工智能系统。【原文：LG Group is rolling out a new version of its flagship artificial intelligence model, billing it as South Korea’s first hybrid-reasoning AI system.】

item.title: 尽管澳大利亚央行利率震荡，澳大利亚消费者信心指数仍有所上升
item.description: 尽管储备银行维持利率不变震惊了市场，但由于家庭对其财务状况的评估有所改善，澳大利亚 7 月份的消费者信心略有上升。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence edged higher in July as households’ assessment of their financial position improved even after the Reserve Bank shocked markets by keeping interest rates unchanged.】

item.title: 特朗普发出对更多贸易谈判持开放态度的信号，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示愿意与包括欧盟在内的主要经济体进行更多关税谈判后，黄金在周一小幅下跌后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied following a modest drop on Monday after President Donald Trump said he was open to more tariff negotiations with major economies including the European Union.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期政府债券收益率升至 2008 年以来最高点
item.description: 日本 10 年期国债收益率周二攀升至 2008 年以来的最高水平，原因是人们对本月上议院选举前的财政支出感到担忧。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond yield climbed to its highest level since 2008 on Tuesday amid concerns over fiscal spending ahead of an upper house election this month.】

item.title: 豪华住宅开发热潮引发印度房地产股票飙升
item.description: 强劲的住宅预售和豪华住宅项目的蓬勃发展将增强投资者的信心，在这种乐观情绪的推动下，印度房地产股的反弹势头正在增强。【原文：A rally in India’s real estate stocks is gaining momentum, driven by optimism that robust residential pre-sales and a boom in luxury housing projects will bolster investor confidence.】

item.title: 借贷成本降低，港元债券销售激增
item.description: 第二季度港元债券销售额激增，因为在香港采取货币干预措施将短期借贷成本降至近乎零后，发行商急于筹集资金。【原文：Bond sales in Hong Kong dollars surged in the second quarter as issuers rushed to raise funds after currency interventions in the city drove down short-term borrowing costs to nearly zero.】

item.title: 欧盟 720 亿欧元清单瞄准波音、美国汽车和波旁酒
item.description: 随着跨大西洋贸易紧张局势的加剧，如果美国决定采取报复行动，欧盟将针对价值 720 亿欧元（840 亿美元）的美国商品（包括波音公司的飞机、汽车和波旁酒）采取第二份反措施清单。【原文：The European Union has finalized a second list of countermeasures to target US goods worth €72 billion ($84 billion), including Boeing Co. aircraft, automobiles and bourbon if it decides to retaliate as transatlantic trade tensions intensify.】

item.title: 特斯拉期待已久的印度首秀押宝豪华车买家
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车制造商特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc. is opening its first India showroom as Elon Musk’s electric-vehicle maker looks to ply new markets and offset slowing sales where it’s already well established.】

item.title: 前日本央行首席经济学家认为最快将于 10 月加息
item.description: 日本央行前首席经济学家表示，如果关税不确定性减弱，日本通胀足够强劲，日本央行最快可在今年秋季考虑加息。【原文：Japanese inflation is strong enough for the Bank of Japan to consider an interest rate hike as soon as this fall if tariff uncertainties fade, according to a former BOJ chief economist.】

item.title: 交易商评估俄罗斯供应前景，石油保持跌势
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普向俄罗斯施压的最新计划没有立即采取旨在阻碍莫斯科能源出口的新措施，在周一暴跌超过2%之后，石油保持跌势。【原文：Oil held a drop — after slumping by more than 2% on Monday — as US President Donald Trump’s latest plan to pressure Russia refrained from immediate new measures aimed at hindering Moscow’s energy exports.】

item.title: 商界游说团警告：爱尔兰下一份预算必须审慎
item.description: 爱尔兰最大的商业说客表示，爱尔兰财政部必须更好地平衡收支，以保护公共财政免受全球贸易动荡的影响。【原文：Ireland’s finance ministry must better balance income and expenditure to protect public finances from global trade turmoil, the country’s biggest business lobbyist said.】

item.title: 里夫斯面对城市发表下议院撕裂后的首次重要讲话
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在其向伦敦金融城发表的年度旗舰演讲中强调通过放宽抵押贷款来刺激购房的计划，这对英国财政大臣来说是一个关键时刻，因为她正试图从坎坷的时期中反弹，其中包括在下议院泪流满面的亮相。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will highlight plans to spur homeownership by easing access to mortgages in her flagship annual address to the City of London, a key moment for Britain’s finance minister as she seeks to bounce back from a rocky period that included a market-moving tearful appearance in the House of Commons.】

item.title: 澳大利亚建议取消信用卡和借记卡附加费
item.description: 澳大利亚央行希望商家取消信用卡和借记卡支付附加费，此举每年可为消费者节省约 12 亿澳元（约合 7.85 亿美元）。【原文：Australia’s central bank wants merchants to remove surcharging on credit and debit card payments, in a move that could save consumers about A$1.2 billion ($785 million) a year.】

item.title: 淡化关税，亚洲股市将迎来上涨：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘向好，交易员们将唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税威胁视为讨价还价的策略，认为这不太可能破坏全球贸易。【原文：Asian equities are set for a positive open as traders brush off President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats as bargaining tactics that are unlikely to derail global trade.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴和百度引领亚洲股票挂钩债券销售激增
item.description: 2025 年，亚洲可转换为股票的债券销售额飙升，达到多年来的新高，因为利率居高不下，股市反弹为这一市场领域的繁荣创造了有利条件。【原文：Asian sales of bonds that can be turned into shares have soared in 2025, heading toward multiyear highs, as interest rates remain elevated and rallying stocks create the right conditions for this corner of the market to thrive.】

item.title: 边缘政党誓言 "日本优先"，削弱自民党统治
item.description: 日本自民党在过去的 70 年里一直统治着日本，仅两次失去对政府的控制权。大流行病期间，一个在社交媒体上拼凑起来的五年之久的政党正试图利用选民的不满情绪和反外国人的情绪来削弱对权力的控制。【原文：Japan’s Liberal Democratic Party has dominated the country for the last 70 years, losing control of the government only twice. A five-year-old party cobbled together on social media during the pandemic is trying to weaken that grip on power by tapping into voter frustrations and anti-foreigner sentiment.】
